original_text: The servant who had received 1,000 gold coins then came to his master. The servant said, “Master, I know what you are like. You tell people what they should do all the time. You take food from fields where you did not put any seed in the ground. You get fruit from trees that you did not plant.
korean_text: 한 달란트 받았던 자는 와서 이르되 주인이여 당신은 굳은 사람이라 심지 않은 데서 거두고 헤치지 않은 데서 모으는 줄을 내가 알았으므로

sentences.original_text: The servant who had received 1,000 gold coins
Master, I know what you are like
You tell people what they should do
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 사람들에게 무엇을 해야 하는지 말씀합니다

sentences.original_text: where you did not put any seed in the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 당신이 씨를 뿌리지 않은 땅입니다
